author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
I've been a big fan of server side cursors for a while and GNOME didn't initially want to introduce the protocol but that's changed and now things can finally progress.

GTK MR: https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gtk/-/merge_requests/6212

Cursor Shape Issues: https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/wayland/wayland-protocols/-/issues/185
W3C Changes: https://github.co
title: GNOME Finally Supports Wayland Server Side Cursors!!
